channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Scriptler Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Scriptler Plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-21668|2024-08-03T18:23:27.481Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20scriptler%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Scriptler Plugin 3.1 and earlier does not escape script content, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Scriptler/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2021-21667|2024-08-03T18:23:27.512Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20scriptler%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Scriptler Plugin 3.2 and earlier does not escape parameter names shown in job configuration forms, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Scriptler/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2021-21700|2024-08-03T18:23:29.167Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20scriptler%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Scriptler Plugin 3.3 and earlier does not escape the name of scripts on the UI when asking to confirm their deletion, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by exploitable by attackers able to create Scriptler scripts.
